summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Simply Smarter Ltd corporate landing page. All core requirements successfully implemented and functioning correctly.
passed_tests: Header displays with SVG logo, company title 'SIMPLY SMARTER LTD', and email 'admin@simplysmarter.io'
Mission section displays correct text about AI-driven tools and wealth management
Vision section displays correct text about asset management
Future Projects section displays 'Coming Soon' placeholder
Footer displays with copyright text 'Â© 2026 Simply Smarter Ltd. All rights reserved.'
Page uses dark background (#050505) with white text for high contrast
Email link is clickable with proper mailto:admin@simplysmarter.io functionality
Scroll animations work smoothly using framer-motion
No buttons in header - clean minimalist layout confirmed
No prohibited content (SSW3.io references, director names, addresses)
Logo has correct white fill color (#FFFFFF)
Company title has correct white text color
Responsive design works on mobile viewport
Professional modernist design with high contrast achieved
